round_best: Develop a turn-taking simulation environment using audio foundation models where agents are trained to adapt their conversation styles based on real-time analysis of acoustic signals and linguistic cues from the environment and other speakers. The models could use reinforcement learning to optimize their turn-taking strategies, reducing overlaps and silences dynamically, based on feedback from the system on conversational fluidity and contextual appropriateness. This setup would enable the iterative training of models in increasingly complex conversational scenarios, gradually improving their ability to mimic human-like interaction nuances.
